#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()

{
	int test_cases;
	cin >> test_cases;
	while(test_cases>0)
	{
	 int num,a;
	 long int power;
	 cin >> num >> power;
	 if(power%4==0)
     {a = pow(num%10,4);
        cout << (a%10) << '\n' ;}
       else
	 {a = pow(num%10,power%4);
	 cout << (a%10) << '\n';}

	 test_cases--;
	}
return 0;

}
